page.title: 06OUR SCHOOL CARETAKER
page.content:
OUR SCHOOL CARETAKER
Our caretaker has been a caretaker for 20 years and has lived in the school house for 16 years. His house has been here 26 years. Sometimes he works from 6am-10pm. He enjoys his job and says it can be hard work sometimes The boiler room is run by gas and is computerised. Above the room is a tall chimney. The hardest job he has to do is clean the three boilers which takes 2-3 hours. The easiest job he has to do is collect the post. His wife helps him clean the school. He likes helping on sports day. Other jobs our caretaker has to do are change a light bulb, look after the pumps and the water tanks. He has 5 weeks holiday a year and gets an average caretakers wage.
